awe.check: Awe Check: Morale Roll ${this.moraleRoll} vs. ${this.aweRoll} Awe Roll.

attack.check: Attack Check: Attack Roll ${this.attackRoll} vs. ${this.defenceRoll} (${this.parry}) Defence Roll.

glamour.fail: The target was an illusion. The attack has no effect.

displacement.fail: The target was displaced. The attack has no effect.

fireShield.intro: The attack is met with ${this.target}'s Fire Shield.

poisonAura: ${this.target} is affected by a poison aura!

ethereal.fail: The attack goes through ${this.target}'s intangible body and has no effect.

mrNegates.check: MR Negates Check: Penetration Roll ${this.penetrationRoll} vs. ${mrRoll} MR Roll.
mrNegates.fail: The attack is nullified and has no effect.
mrNegates.success: The attack bypasses the magic resistance.

poisonBarbs.intro: The attacker is met with ${this.target}'s Poison Barbs.

poisonSkin.intro: The attacker is affected by ${this.target}'s Poison Skin.

damage.check: Damage Check: Damage Roll ${this.damageRoll} vs. ${this.protectionRoll} Protection Roll.
damage.droppedItems: ${this.target} had to drop the following item(s): ${this.droppedItems}!

twistFate: The damage was negated by Twist Fate.

berserk.check: Berserk Check: Morale Roll ${this.moraleRoll} vs. ${this.difficulty} Diffilty Roll.
berserk.fail: ${this.actor} fails to tap into his rage.
